attributes.action: ISP's and the search Providers (Google & Microsoft) must gather data on those searching for child porn and block those searches
attributes.additional_details:
It is difficult to protect children from being abused, raped and murdered (and to identify likely suspects) unless the information on people searching for child porn through the search engines is captured and the person searching can be identified.
We must stop the needless suffering and murder of innocent children like April Jones. Both the UK ISP's and the search engine providers must be compelled to take action on this.
Even if they will lose revenue, the protection of UK's babies and children must take priority over profit.
If you want to do something about the abuse and murder of innocent children in the UK, please sign this petition. And by signing it, make a commitment to only vote in the next general election for the government that has introduced these measures to protect our children.
Political parties may not always act on the things that are important to us but, they do need our votes at election time.
